purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of planned as well as actual outputs from an activity or a task.

ul.li: Definition and quantification of work output;
Relationships between the work output statement and detailed descriptions of the work output item e.g. a product, a serialized item etc;
Classification of work output and work output relationships.

purpose.example: An example of a relationship between work outputs is the relationship between the planned and the actual work output.
purpose.p: The following are not enabled by this module alone but are enabled by modules that use this module:

ul.li: Property, date and descriptive representation assignment;

inscope.li: Definition and quantification of planned as well as recorded work outputs;
Relationships between the work output and detailed descriptions of the output.

outscope.li: Detailed description of the work output;
Descriptions of the activity or task that delivers or produces the output;

uof.name: Work_output
uof.description: The Work output UoF lists the planned and/or actual outputs from an associated activity or task.
